generatedTitle: Choosing the Right Console for Red Dead Redemption 2

extractFactDictList.question: Who developed Red Dead Redemption 2?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Red Dead Redemption 2 is an open-world western action-adventure game developed by Rockstar Games.

extractFactDictList.question: When was Red Dead Redemption 2 released?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The game was released in 2018 and has since become one of the most popular games of all time.

extractFactDictList.question: What are some important aspects of the game?
